text: Privatization of VHA care? Nein, danke! 🙅‍♂️💉 New studies show that private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care. 💸🚫 VHA providers receive extensive training to better understand and treat veteran-specific mental and physical problems. 💪🏽👨‍⚕️ Let's not sacrifice quality care for our heroes.
